quest.name: Righteous Indignation
journal: Estinien is ready to lead the way to Tiamat.
objectives: Speak with Alphinaud at the Flagship.
Search for the necessary Allagan node.
Use the field trial spirit vessel to access the clamorous node.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It was the Ascians who taught Tiamat the secrets of summoning...even as they supplied the Allagans with the means to capture primals. So much suffering, all of it by design.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Our grandfather sacrificed everything to protect the realm from Bahamut. We must be prepared to do the same.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: The Azure Dragoons of history were the mortal enemies of the dragons. Yet now they would be hard-pressed to find a soul who understood them better.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Tiamat awaits. This way.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Resigned to her fate though she may be, I cannot help but feel that we may be able to help Tiamat...would she only let us.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: To think that man is responsible for all this─and so much else that dragonkind has suffered...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: So this is one of the seven great wyrms... Even thus confined, her presence is...overwhelming.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I confess, my heart was in my throat when Estinien thought to berate her, but it appears to have had the desired effect.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: It won't make up for what she's suffered at the hands of men, but if there's a chance we can free her─truly free her─we owe it to her to try.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: It would seem she still has some pride after all. Let's see if she's as good as her word.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: While porxies have been shown to be effective in curing the tempered, Tiamat must be considered a special case.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: She is far, far larger─and immeasurably more powerful─than any subject treated thus far. Were we to remove her restraints only to find that the process had failed, we would be hard-pressed to contain her.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Then...before going ahead, we should learn as much as we can about the exact nature of her condition. Do you suppose we can find that information here?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Why, yes...we can! We can indeed! The Allagans kept detailed records on all of their notable captives, and I know exactly where to look.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We shall leave that to you, then. In the meantime, the rest of us can turn our thoughts to the removal of those shackles.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I know Alphinaud and Forename here well enough─but not you. Are you certain you're ready to see this through?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Rest assured, Ser Estinien, that I am both ready and willing to give my all for the sake of this star─though that is not my only reason for wanting to set Tiamat free.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: While I do not claim to know all of her sorrows, I too once found myself in a prison of despair. And I well understand how hard it can be to dare to dream of escape.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: It took the encouragement of braver souls than I am to make me take the first step towards a brighter future. And now I would help Tiamat do the same.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I gather you are not as young as you look.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Mayhap when our work here is done, we could trade tales over a pot of Tataru's famous tea?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: And be indebted to her for the leaves and hot water? I think not.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: ...I see. Ahem! Returning swiftly to the task at hand, then...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: I believe the nodes governing Tiamat's restraints are located in the sector known as the Flagship.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ah yes. We are familiar with it. The Aetherochemical Research Facility in particular.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Oh, you may wish to take this. A spirit vessel, containing a small amount of my blood.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Which you just happened to be carrying around with you.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: I suppose that could seem rather odd. To explain, Rammbroes, Urianger, and I are researching the use of spirit vessels in the transference not only of memories, but the traits of certain bloodlines. And so I keep one at the ready should an opportunity to test our theories arise.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: As for its use to you, you may recall that during our previous visit, the nodes here granted access to restricted functions, having identified me as being of royal blood. And armed with that spirit vessel, I posit that they will do the same for you, even in the absence of, well, the rest of me. It seemed worth a try, at least.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Agreed. We will take good care of it.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: To the Flagship, then!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: It's possible the restraints may have mitigated the effects of her tempering, but Tiamat has been in thrall to Bahamut for thousands of years. To have clung on to her reason through it all says a lot for her strength of will. More than a lot.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Alisaie and I shall remain here and attend to necessary preparations. In the event that the spirit vessel fails to work as expected, you know where to find me. Good luck.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I would rather leave these Allagan contraptions to you and Alphinaud...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Let us split up and search the Flagship for the node that controls Tiamat's restraints.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: But should you find a likely candidate, do not be tempted to make any adjustments; it would not do to accidentally release some manner of experimental monstrosity, nor less Tiamat herself in her current state. Our objective at this stage is simply to identify the relevant node or nodes. Once we have learned what we can, we should reconvene and compare notes prior to proceeding.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I realize I've said this before─and on more than one occasion─but I never cease to be amazed by Allagan technology. Amazed and disturbed.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: These...nodes, or whatever it is you call them─why do they quiver so?

dialogue.name: ALLAGANSYSTEMA04060
dialogue.text: BZZZT... Friction between metallic components detected... Temperature increasing to critical levels... Please replace damaged parts or retreat to a safe distance... BZZZT...

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <bloop> WARNING. Scheduled dragon restraint maintenance due in: –2,020 years. Failure to verify system integrity may result in unscheduled specimen release.

dialogue.name: ALLAGANSYSTEMB04060
dialogue.text: KRRR... Data link with Delta Quadrant broken. Possible cause: intruder interference. Advise deployment of automated combat units. Proceed?

dialogue.name: ALLAGANSYSTEMA04060
dialogue.text: BZZZT... Friction between metallic components detected... Temperature increasing to critical levels... Please replace damaged parts or retreat to a safe distance... BZZZT...

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <bloop> WARNING. Scheduled dragon restraint maintenance due in: –2,020 years. Failure to verify system integrity may result in unscheduled specimen release.

dialogue.name: ALLAGANSYSTEMB04060
dialogue.text: KRRR... Data link with Delta Quadrant broken. Possible cause: intruder interference. Advise deployment of automated combat units. Proceed?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Infernal things... One of them sent a swarm of mechanical vilekin to plague me. I must have angered it...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I am afraid Estinien and I have little to show for our efforts. Did you find anything?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I did! A node which smelled like burned hair!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Yes. A chirruping node which spontaneously warned me about neglecting the dragon restraints.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I, uh...found a way to activate mechanical sentries if that's any help?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: No.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Hmph. I know the one─though I thought the stench more akin to a fire in a manure shed. But it seemed likelier to explode than grant our wish. Surely there must be another?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Spontaneously, you say? Well, that does sound promising. Almost suspiciously so, in fact...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Only if they are willing to lead us to the node we seek...which I somehow doubt. But from what I recall of the Flagship's design, the node you found could facilitate communications throughout Azys Lla, so we may yet find a use for it.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: But then you were in possession of the spirit vessel... Hm. I daresay it is indeed the node of which G'raha spoke.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: And it was “chirruping,” you say? Very well, let us take a closer look.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As I suspected, the node will not acknowledge my authority to issue it instructions.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: How did the Allagans tell these godsforsaken things apart?

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> Do you wish to operate the dragon restraint mechanisms?

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <bloop> You do not have the requisite access privileges. Operation of the dragon restraint mechanisms may only be undertaken by the chief technologist and members of the royal family.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Or those with a vessel full of royal blood, perhaps.

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Restrainment Node-)<blip> New user detected. Commencing biometric authentication...

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Restrainment Node-)<bloop> Authentication complete. User identified as: member of the royal family. Please state your name.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Forename Surname.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Alphinaud Leveilleur.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Estinien Wyrmblood.

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Restrainment Node-)<bloop> Welcome, Forename Surname. You may operate the dragon restraint mechanisms when ready.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: But─ But that's just confusing! Amusing as you may find my name, I must ask that you use Forename Surname. Please.

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Restrainment Node-)<bloop> User name changed. Welcome, Forename Surname. You may operate the dragon restraint mechanisms when ready.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: ...Very funny. But if that thing speaks my name, I shall see that it never speaks again. Use your own. Forename Surname, in case you've forgotten.

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Restrainment Node-)<bloop> User name changed. Welcome, Forename Surname. You may operate the dragon restraint mechanisms when ready.

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Restrainment Node-)<blip> <bloop> Error: Unable to disengage restraints of the specimen “Tiamat.” A system update is required.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...A “system update”? What do you suppose it is asking of us?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I...could hazard a guess.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: To smash it to pieces...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Well, that's more than I can say. Confounded bloody thing...

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Now that I do understand. You can go first.

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Restrainment Node-)User agitation detected. Initiating guidance program...
<bloop> In order to operate the restraint mechanism, I require access to the central control system. However, I am unable to establish a link to said system due to the obsolescence of my own software.

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Restrainment Node-)This issue can be resolved by applying a system update using the corresponding terminal located within the Flagship.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: So can this thing release the restraints or not?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It can─but only once it has received the requisite “system update,” as far as I can tell.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: ...Until which time it'll float there spewing nonsense?

dialogue.name: SECURITYSYSTEM
dialogue.text:
(-Restrainment Node-)User dissatisfaction detected. Initiating placation protocols...
<bloop> I am here to help! Rest assured that I will be on hand to guide you through every step of the system update process!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: How...gratifying. But I daresay we will fare better with guidance than without it.
